input.sentences: today was [female] 's first time visiting the local fair .
this year 's fair seemed bigger than the last .
even aunt [female] came all the way down here to join us .
[female] had fun on the huge swing and
output.sentences: The young girl was visiting her aunt during summertime break and they went to the local fair.
The fair was much bigger than she remembered as a child.
She brought a friend to join her, another young female, and her aunt.
After they rode the swing, they shared a huge ice cream sundae and had fun people-watching.
They finished off the day going down the massive water slide.
